data.event: The town of Nazareth was established through the efforts of a Catholic priest, Joseph Reisdorff, who moved to the site in 1902 with four farmers interested in purchasing land in the area.

event.title: September 1902 the first settlers had begun

data.event: By September 1902 the first settlers had begun to arrive.
A post office was established in 1903, and later that year the Catholic community finished building its first church.

event.title: later that year the Catholic community finished

data.event: A post office was established in 1903, and later that year the Catholic community finished building its first church.

event.title: 1905, in addition to the church, the settlement included

data.event: By 1905, in addition to the church, the settlement included a blacksmith shop, a store, and a school; when the community's cemetery was consecrated in 1906, it became the only Catholic cemetery in the area.

By 1905, in addition to the church, the settlement included a blacksmith shop, a store, and a school; when the community's cemetery was consecrated in 1906, it became the only Catholic cemetery in the area.

event.title: many years local church officials supplied

data.event: For many years local church officials supplied what little government the community required.
